headline.main: Posey, Duffy Back Bumgarner; Giants Beat Rockies 7-4
headline.print_headline: Posey, Duffy Back Bumgarner; Giants Beat Rockies 7-4

docs.snippet: Buster Posey connected for his 100th career home run and Matt Duffy hit a tiebreaking two-run triple in a five-run fifth, backing a gritty effort from Madison Bumgarner as the San Francisco Giants beat the Colorado Rockies 7-4 Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Buster Posey connected for his 100th career home run and Matt Duffy hit a tiebreaking two-run triple in a five-run fifth, backing a gritty effort from Madison Bumgarner as the San Francisco Giants beat the Colorado Rockies 7-4 Sunday.

headline.main: Temple Co-Founder Wants to Start Buddhist Frat and Sorority
headline.print_headline: Temple Co-Founder Wants to Start Buddhist Frat and Sorority

docs.snippet: The Greek gods on Fraternity Row at San Diego State University may have to make room for the Buddha....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Greek gods on Fraternity Row at San Diego State University may have to make room for the Buddha.

headline.main: North Sea Loses 5,500 Jobs in Oil Market Downturn-Regulator
headline.print_headline: North Sea Loses 5,500 Jobs in Oil Market Downturn-Regulator

docs.snippet: Britain's North Sea oil and gas sector has shed more than 5,000 jobs since late last year, the country's new Oil and Gas Authority said on Monday, putting an official figure on job losses resulting from a year-long decline in oil prices....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's North Sea oil and gas sector has shed more than 5,000 jobs since late last year, the country's new Oil and Gas Authority said on Monday, putting an official figure on job losses resulting from a year-long decline in oil prices.

headline.main: Restaurant Famous for 'Kitchen Nightmares' Appearance Closes
headline.print_headline: Restaurant Famous for 'Kitchen Nightmares' Appearance Closes

docs.snippet: A Phoenix-area restaurant that became notorious after the owners were seen yelling at unhappy customers and pocketing employees' tips during an episode of the Fox reality show, "Kitchen Nightmares," has closed....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Phoenix-area restaurant that became notorious after the owners were seen yelling at unhappy customers and pocketing employees' tips during an episode of the Fox reality show, "Kitchen Nightmares," has closed.

headline.main: UK Manufacturers Halve 2015 Growth Forecast as Export Orders Slump
headline.print_headline: UK Manufacturers Halve 2015 Growth Forecast as Export Orders Slump

docs.snippet: Britain's main manufacturing lobby has halved its forecast for growth this year after overseas orders fell to their lowest since the financial crisis, while recruiters said skills shortages were leading to higher wages but slower job growth....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's main manufacturing lobby has halved its forecast for growth this year after overseas orders fell to their lowest since the financial crisis, while recruiters said skills shortages were leading to higher wages but slower job growth.

headline.main: Sustainable Investing a Fiduciary Duty for Fund Managers, Says U.N.-Backed Study
headline.print_headline: Sustainable Investing a Fiduciary Duty for Fund Managers, Says U.N.-Backed Study

docs.snippet: Fund managers that do not incorporate sustainability criteria into their investment decisions are failing in their fiduciary duty, a United Nations-backed report said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fund managers that do not incorporate sustainability criteria into their investment decisions are failing in their fiduciary duty, a United Nations-backed report said on Monday.

headline.main: Iraq Mounts Air Operation With F-16s
headline.print_headline: Iraq Mounts Air Operation With F-16s

docs.snippet: The Pentagon says Iraq's air force has gone after the Islamic State group for the first time using F-16 fighter planes bought from the U.S....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Pentagon says Iraq's air force has gone after the Islamic State group for the first time using F-16 fighter planes bought from the U.S.

headline.main: Cavorting Wins Grade 2 Prioress Stakes at Saratoga
headline.print_headline: Cavorting Wins Grade 2 Prioress Stakes at Saratoga

docs.snippet: Cavorting raced to a three-length victory over Bar of Gold on Sunday in the Grade 2 $300,000 Prioress Stakes for 3-year-old fillies at Saratoga Race Course....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cavorting raced to a three-length victory over Bar of Gold on Sunday in the Grade 2 $300,000 Prioress Stakes for 3-year-old fillies at Saratoga Race Course.

headline.main: Afghan Surgeon Earns From Rich to Help Pay for Treating Poor
headline.print_headline: Afghan Surgeon Earns From Rich to Help Pay for Treating Poor

docs.snippet: Plastic surgeon Abdul Ghafar Ghayur is practicing his own brand of welfare in Afghanistan, where access to healthcare is limited and many cannot afford private treatment....
docs.lead_paragraph: Plastic surgeon Abdul Ghafar Ghayur is practicing his own brand of welfare in Afghanistan, where access to healthcare is limited and many cannot afford private treatment.
